TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientCertificate extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection

summary.span: Provides the client certificate fields issued by the client in response to the server's request for the client's identity.

span.span: Provides the client certificate fields issued by the client in response to the server's request for the client's identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si un explorador Web utiliza el protocolo SSL3.0/PCT1 (la dirección URL comienza por https:// en lugar de http://) para conectarse a un servidor y el servidor requiere certificados de cliente, el explorador envía campos incluidos en su certificado digital de certificado de cliente.If a Web browser uses the SSL3.0/PCT1 protocol (the URL begins with https:// instead of http://) to connect to a server and the server requires client certificates, the browser sends the client certificate fields contained in its digital certificate. Para obtener más información acerca de los certificados digitales, consulte el documento X.509: clave pública y atributo certificate frameworks, disponible en el sitio de la Unión internacional de telecomunicaciones (ITU) en http://www.itu.int.For more information about digital certificates, see the document X.509: Public-key and attribute certificate frameworks, available on the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) site at http://www.itu.int.

.property instance unsigned int8[] BinaryIssuer
Public ReadOnly Property BinaryIssuer As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ BinaryIssuer { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the certificate issuer, in binary format.

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate issuer, in binary format.

value.span: El emisor del certificado, expresado en formato binario.

span.span: The certificate issuer, expressed in binary format.

.property instance int32 CertEncoding
Public ReadOnly Property CertEncoding As Integer
public: property int CertEncoding { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the encoding of the certificate.

span.span: Gets the encoding of the certificate.

value.span: Uno de los valores de CERT_CONTEXT.dwCertEncodingType.

span.span: One of the CERT_CONTEXT.dwCertEncodingType values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la estructura CERT_CONTEXT, consulte http://msdn.microsoft.com y busque CERT_CONTEXT.For more information about the CERT_CONTEXT structure, see http://msdn.microsoft.com and search for CERT_CONTEXT.

public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Certificate { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a string containing the binary stream of the entire certificate content, in ASN.1 format.

span.span: Gets a string containing the binary stream of the entire certificate content, in ASN.1 format.
The client certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Cookie { get; }
.property instance string Cookie
Public ReadOnly Property Cookie As String
public: property System::String ^ Cookie { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the unique ID for the client certificate, if provided.

span.span: Gets the unique ID for the client certificate, if provided.

value.span: El identificador de certificado de cliente.

span.span: The client certificate ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La puede utilizarse como una firma para el certificado de cliente completa.The can be used as a signature for the whole client certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Flags { get; }
.property instance int32 Flags
Public ReadOnly Property Flags As Integer
public: property int Flags { int get(); };

summary.span: A set of flags that provide additional client certificate information.

span.span: A set of flags that provide additional client certificate information.
A set of Boolean flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Bit 0 se establece en 1 si el certificado de cliente está presente.Bit0 is set to 1 if the client certificate is present. Bit1 se establece en 1 si la entidad de certificación (CA) del certificado del cliente no está en la lista de entidades de certificación reconocida en el servidor.Bit1 is set to 1 if the Certificate Authority (CA) of the client certificate is not in the list of recognized CAs on the server.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the client certificate is valid.

value.span: Si el certificado de cliente es válido; en caso contrario, .

span.span: if the client certificate is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El certificado de cliente no es válido si la entidad de certificación (CA) no está en la lista de entidades de certificación reconocida en el servidor.The client certificate is not valid if the Certificate Authority (CA) is not in the list of recognized CAs on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si `String` se especifica sin un campo secundario, la colección devuelve una lista separada por comas de subcampos.If `String` is specified without a subfield, the collection returns a comma-separated list of subfields. Por ejemplo, C = US, O = Msft.For example, C=US, O= Msft.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor del año se muestra como un número de cuatro dígitos.The year value is displayed as a four-digit number.
